text:
Qualifications Summary
Highly skilled professional having strong business perspective to technology, with
educational  qualifications  including  M.TECHin  Construction  Technology  and
Management as well as B.Tech (Civil Engg.) . Experienced in implementing hands-
on assignments/projects involved in  large multistoried  Residential Complexes .
Highly  skilled  in  managing  teams  with  a  strong  ability  to  work  hard  under
challenging  circumstances  and  handle  multiple  projects  simultaneously.
Construction  Project  Management  is  the  overall  planning,  co-ordination  and
control  of  a  project  from  inception  to  completion  aimed  at  meeting  a  client’s
requirements in order to produce a functionally and financially viable project that
will  be  completed  on  time  within  authorized  cost  and  to  the  required  quality
standards. Project management is the process by which a project is brought to a
successful  conclusion.  Construction  project  management  (CPM)  is  project
management that applies to the construction sector.
